funFacts: Can carry on a simple conversation in Mandarin Chinese.  Once moved across the country in a 1979 Mercury Montego with only $300.

description: Tall skinny white dude with no rhythm.
funFacts: Has been gassed, irradiated, burned and still didn’t become a super hero.
